name: Steigenberger Hotel El Tahrir Cairo
location: Kasr El Nile, Cairo, Egypt
description: Among Cairo hotels, Steigenberger El Tahrir secures a spectacular location in El Tahrir Square, overlooking the Egyptian museum, minutes away from Khan El Khalili Bazar, and in close proximity to Egypt's major attractions with a total area of 21,633 sqm. The hotel boasts 295 guest rooms and suites with luxurious decoration items and in-room amenities. This landmark hotel is an ideal location for business trips and social events, offering a variety of culinary outlets, a swimming pool, gym and banqueting facilities.

rooms.description: Junior Suite with 40sqm of space enjoy city views and can accommodates maximum occupancy of three persons. It includes separate living area stylishly complemented by up-to-the-minute technology, free WiFi throughout the hotel and in-room tea and coffee making facilities.

Wake up in a stylishly complemented by up-to-the-minute technology room overlooking the swimming pool or cabana poolside. Pastel pinks blend with gentle grays, beige upholstery and the rich, warm tones of wood surrounds and sound-proofed window free WiFi throughout the hotel, private in-room safe box, queen bed and tea and coffee making facilities.

The lavishly-appointed Capital Suite boast 80 sqm of space, comprising dressing room, spacious bedroom with Queen bed, dining and lounge area with desk and work space, plus an extra small bathroom. Capital suites enjoy panoramic views over Tahrir Square and the Egyptian Museum with a tantalizing glimpse of the River Nile.

name: Le Meridien Cairo Airport
location: Cairo international Airport terminal 3, Heliopolis, 11341 Cairo, Egypt
description: Rooms here will provide you with a flat-screen TV, air conditioning and a seating area. There is also an electric kettle. Private bathrooms also come with a shower. Extras include satellite channels, All rooms feature soundproofing, and complimentary Wi-Fi.

rooms.description: Offering free toiletries and bathrobes, this double room includes a private bathroom with a walk-in shower, a bath and a hairdryer. name: Grand Nile Tower
location: Corniche El Nile, Garden City, Cairo, Egypt
description: The elegantly decorated rooms and suites at Grand Nile Tower come with a work desk, satellite TV and minibar. Each offers a modern bathroom stocked with amenities and a hairdryer. Guests can enjoy views of the Nile from the revolving restaurant, which serves International dishes. Japanese, Indian and Italian cuisine are also available, and live entertainment is organised regularly on the hotel’s private yacht.

rooms.description: This spacious room offers a separate work area and a private balcony overlooking the Nile River. The marble bathroom has a bathtub and shower, and is stocked with a hairdryer and amenities.

rooms.description: All executive rooms include: - Complimentary daily breakfast at the lounge. - Fruit basket upon check-in. - Daily Happy Hour. - Bottle of water upon check-in. - 15% discount on massage service. - 20% discount on laundry service.

The separate living room is connected to another bathroom and features a work desk. Private check-in & check-out within the Executive floor.

name: Movenpick Resort El Quseir
location: Sirena Beach, 84712 Quseir, Egypt
description: 250 rooms are set in clusters of stone-clad bungalows with high domed ceilings in atmospheric style. A beautiful private sandy beach and stunning coral reef tempt guests to explore the bays pristine underwater. The myriad of marine life inhabiting the resort’s own house reef, amaze divers and snorkelers alike.

rooms.description: Where location is key our Premium Garden View 26 sqm rooms are in the perfect spot to enjoy the best the hotel has to offer. Located close to the famous El Quadim Bay house reef and dove center for those wishing to head underwater while on holiday there is no better place to do it. The beautifully appointed rooms feature a queen bed and bathroom with shower.

Junior Suite with Sea View (Adult Only) Unwind in our Junior Suites Sea View which have unrivaled panoramic views of the pristine Red Sea waters. If you like the idea of a dip, our upscale amenities include a practical straw bag for all your beach essentials. The Suites are 59 sqm but all come equipped with a queen bed and bathroom with a shower. The Suites are for Adults only.

Whether on a romantic break, a stay with your dove buddies or a family getaway, our Nubian Suite is the perfect choice for any occasion. Experience the luxury of our exclusive 70 sqm Nubian Suite which has everything you could possibly need for a trip to remember. The spacious terrace is the perfect backdrop to the stunning Red Sea vistas, which can be enjoyed night and day. . The suite will be the best choice for three adults or a family of two adults and one child. The third Adult or a child will be accommodated on the existing sofa bed.

rooms.description: The 23-square-meter classic Superior Rooms overlook the Nile and feature a king-size bed, air-conditioning, free Wi-Fi, TV, minibar, safe, and coffee and tea facilities - private bathrooms round out the amenities.

Use the Presidential Suite for an extra luxurious stay in Luxor: The suite offers a master bedroom with a king size bed, an additional bedroom with two separate beds and private bathroom, a living room, a dining room and a small kitchenette for preparing meals and snacks. The master bathroom is equipped with additional amenities such as a whirlpool bathtub and a separate shower with wall shower and bidet. A beautiful terrace overlooking the Nile River completes the package.

Use the Royal Suite for an extra luxurious stay in Luxor: The suite offers 150 m² with a master bedroom with a king-size bed, an additional bedroom with two separate beds and private bathroom, a living room, a dining room and a small kitchenette for preparing meals and snacks. The master bathroom is equipped with additional amenities such as a whirlpool bathtub and a separate shower with wall-mounted showerhead and bidet. A beautiful terrace overlooking the Nile River completes the package.

rooms.description: The spacious 32 m² Classic rooms allow to set an extra bed and offer a beautiful view over the city.
Your stay will be even more comfortable with our newly renovated 40 m² rooms with legendary views of the Nile. We look forward to offering our guests an exceptional experience.
Our 69 m² Junior Suite with city view offers the possibility to separate the living and sleeping area by sliding doors. This provides comfort and privacy.

The air-conditioned single room provides a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a minibar, a tea and coffee maker, a seating area as well as mountain views. The unit offers 1 bed.

Featuring free toiletries, this double room includes a private bathroom with a bath and a shower. The spacious air-conditioned double room features a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a minibar, a tea and coffee maker, a seating area as well as mountain views. The unit has 1 bed.
rooms.view: Mountain view,Nile View or City View.

rooms.description: The air-conditioned suite features 1 bedroom and 1 bathroom with a bath and a shower. The suite provides a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a minibar, a tea and coffee maker, a seating area as well as mountain views. The unit offers 1 bed.

name: Minya Compound of the Armed Forces
location: Down the Nile Bridge / East of the Nile, 99999 Al Minya, Egypt
description: Minya Compound of the Armed Forces features a garden, shared lounge, a terrace and restaurant in Al Minya. Featuring family rooms, this property also provides guests with a children's playground. Free WiFi and room service are provided. At the hotel each room includes air conditioning, a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen, towels and a balcony with a city view. All units include a safety deposit box.

rooms.description: This air-conditioned twin/double room is comprised of a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a private bathroom as well as a balcony with city views.
This air-conditioned triple room is comprised of a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a private bathroom as well as a balcony with city views. The unit has 3 beds.

This spacious suite comes with 1 living room, 2 separate bedrooms and 2 bathrooms with a walk-in shower and a bidet. The air-conditioned suite features a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a minibar, a tea and coffee maker, a seating area as well as city views. The unit has 3 beds.

name: Jewel Assiut Hotel
location: El Iman Area, 99999 Asyut, Egypt
description: Situated in Asyut, 6 km from Railway Station Asyut, Jewel Assiut Hotel features accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. Boasting family rooms, this property also provides guests with a children's playground. Free WiFi and room service are available.

rooms.description: The unit has 1 bed.
This double room has a tile/marble floor, satellite TV and air conditioning.
This triple room has a tile/marble floor, hot tub and minibar.

name: Assiut Cement Hotel
location: El-kilo 14 Assiut Alwadi Road asyut,egypt, 71111 Asyut, Egypt
description: At the hotel, each room includes a wardrobe. At the accommodation rooms have bed linen and towels

rooms.description: The single room features air conditioning, executive lounge access, a terrace with garden views as well as a private bathroom boasting a walk-in shower. The unit has 1 bed.

This chalet provides a pool with a view. This spacious chalet includes 1 living room, 1 separate bedroom and 1 bathroom with a walk-in shower and free toiletries. The fully equipped kitchen has a refrigerator, kitchenware, a microwave and an electric kettle. Boasting a terrace with garden views, this chalet also offers air conditioning and a flat-screen TV. The unit has 2 beds.

This suite features 1 living room, 1 separate bedroom and 1 bathroom with a walk-in shower and free toiletries. Boasting a terrace with garden views, this suite also features air conditioning and a flat-screen TV. The unit has 3 beds.

name: Jewel Inn Beni Suef
location: Ahmed Orabi Street, Nile Cornish, 99999 Beni Suef, Egypt
description: Situated in Beni Suef, 3.5 km from Railway Station - Beni Suef, Jewel Inn Beni Suef features accommodation with a garden, private parking, a shared lounge and a terrace. With a restaurant, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The hotel has an indoor pool and room service. The rooms are fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, minibar, a kettle, a bidet, free toiletries and a wardrobe. At the hotel rooms come with bed linen and towels.

rooms.description: This double room's special feature is the sauna. Providing free toiletries, this double room includes a private bathroom with a shower, a bidet and a hairdryer. The spacious air-conditioned double room provides a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a mini-bar, a tea and coffee maker, a wardrobe as well as pool views. The unit offers 1 bed.

name: Sofitel Legend Old Cataract
location: Abtal El Tahrir Street, 99999 Aswan, Egypt
description: This Victorian building with the pink granite facade has modern rooms with private bathrooms. Each of the air-conditioned rooms is decorated with wooden furniture. Sofitel Legend Old Cataract has 4 restaurants serving international and oriental dishes for breakfast, lunch and dinner. The Oriental Kebabgy Restaurant has a terrace with panoramic views over Nile.

rooms.description: 36m²,Intriguing blend of modernity and opulent luxury, with stunning views overlooking the charming Nile. Sofitel My Bed, LCD TV, marble bathroom, separate shower and bathtub, French amenities, complimentary low bandwidth internet.
39m², distinctive premium furnishings, Sofitel My Bed, LCD TV, safe box, mini-bar, magnifying mirror. marble bathroom, separate shower, hair dryer, French luxury amenities, internet access.

56m², reflects the sense of the history with its classic furnishings, high ceiling and soothing color, Sofitel My Bed, LCD TV, marble bathroom, shower, bathtub, hair dryer, French amenities, complimentary low band internet access.

name: Pyramisa Island Hotel Aswan
location: Corniche El Nil, 99999 Aswan, Egypt
description: Exotic resort in the middle of the Nile on an island near the centre of Aswan. 28 acres of landscaped gardens with magnificent views of the Nile, mountains and Aswan city. Pyramisa Resort is a few minutes sailing to Agha Khan Mausoleum and centre shopping area.  All 450 rooms and suites enjoy exotic panoramic views of the Nile, the mountains, tropical gardens, swimming-pools. Our spacious and comfortable rooms are nicely furnished with all modern facilities and Spa.

rooms.description: This air-conditioned single room is comprised of a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a private bathroom as well as a balcony with garden views. The unit has 1 bed.

The spacious triple room offers air conditioning, a minibar, a balcony with garden views as well as a private bathroom boasting a bath. The unit has 2 beds.

name: Kato Dool Wellness Resort
location: Nag` Gharb Siheil, , 81511 Aswan, Egypt
description: Located in Aswan, 19 km from Aga Khan Mausoleum, Kato Dool Wellness Resort provides accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a shared lounge. With a terrace, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation offers evening entertainment and a tour desk.

rooms.description: The infinity pool is the standout feature of this twin/double room. The spacious twin/double room features air conditioning, a private entrance, a terrace with lake views as well as a private bathroom boasting a walk-in shower.
